pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static, wide shot of a scenic river landscape. A wide, blue river with a noticeable current flows through the center of the frame, its banks broad and covered in gray stones and pebbles. In the background, lush green hills and mountains rise against a bright blue sky filled with large, white, puffy clouds.
